casebody.data:
THE ARUNDEL CORPORATION v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45655] [103 C. Cls. 688;

326 U. S. —]

Government contract; amount of work on dredging operation decreased by hurricane; “Changed Conditions” clause not applicable to an act of God. Petition dismissed.

*858Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 15, 1945.

Rehearing denied November 18,1945.
